verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that decree <S%H2710><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unrighteous <S%H205><s%> decrees <S%H2711><s%>, and that write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8764><s%> grievousness <S%H5999><s%> which they have prescribed <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8765><s%>;

To turn aside <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the needy <S%H1800><s%> from judgment <S%H1779><s%>, and to take away <S%H1497><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the right <S%H4941><s%> from the poor <S%H6041><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, that widows <S%H490><s%> may be their prey <S%H7998><s%>, and that they may rob <S%H962><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> !

And what will ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of visitation <S%H6486><s%>, and in the desolation <S%H7722><s%> which shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from far <S%H4801><s%>? to whom will ye flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%>? and where will ye leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your glory <S%H3519><s%> ?

Without me they shall <S%H1115><s%> bow down <S%H3766><s%> <S%H8804><s%> under the prisoners <S%H616><s%>, and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under the slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8803><s%>. For all this his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out still <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.
O <S%H1945><s%> Ashurn <S%H804><s%>, the rod <S%H7626><s%> of mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and the staff <S%H4294><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> is mine indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him against an hypocritical <S%H2611><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, and against the people <S%H5971><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%> will I give him a charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, to take <S%H7997><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and to take <S%H962><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the prey <S%H957><s%>, and to tread them down <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H4823><s%> like the mire <S%H2563><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%>.

Howbeit he meaneth <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8762><s%> not so, neither doth his heart <S%H3824><s%> think <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so; but it is in his heart <S%H3824><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> not a few <S%H4592><s%>.
For he saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Are not my princes <S%H8269><s%> altogether <S%H3162><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> ?
Is not Calno <S%H3641><s%> as Kark'mish <S%H3751><s%>? is not Hamath <S%H2574><s%> as Arpad <S%H774><s%>? is not SHomron <S%H8111><s%> as Damascus <S%H1834><s%> ?

As my hand <S%H3027><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the idols <S%H457><s%>, and whose graven images <S%H6456><s%> did excel them of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> and of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>;

Shall I not, as I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto SHomron <S%H8111><s%> and her idols <S%H457><s%>, so do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> and her idols <S%H6091><s%> ?

Wherefore it shall come to pass, that when the YY <S%H136><s%> hath performed <S%H1214><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his whole work <S%H4639><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> and on Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, I will punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the stout <S%H1433><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>, and the glory <S%H8597><s%> of his high <S%H7312><s%> looks <S%H5869><s%>.

For he saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, By the strength <S%H3581><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and by my wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; for I am prudent <S%H995><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: and I have removed <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the bounds <S%H1367><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and have robbed <S%H8154><s%> <S%H8782><s%> their treasures <S%H6259><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6264><s%>, and I have put down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> like a valiant <S%H47><s%> <S%H3524><s%> man:

And my hand <S%H3027><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a nest <S%H7064><s%> the riches <S%H2428><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>: and as one gathereth <S%H622><s%> <S%H8800><s%> eggs <S%H1000><s%> that are left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, have I gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the earth <S%H776><s%>; and there was none that moved <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the wing <S%H3671><s%>, or opened <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%>, or peeped <S%H6850><s%> <S%H8772><s%>.

Shall the axe <S%H1631><s%> boast <S%H6286><s%> <S%H8691><s%> itself against him that heweth <S%H2672><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therewith? or shall the saw <S%H4883><s%> magnify <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8691><s%> itself against him that shaketh <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8688><s%> it? as if the rod <S%H7626><s%> should shake <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8687><s%> itself against them that lift it up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, or as if the staff <S%H4294><s%> should lift up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> itself, as if it were no wood <S%H6086><s%>.

Therefore shall the YY <S%H113><s%>, the YY <S%H136><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> among his fat ones <S%H4924><s%> leanness <S%H7332><s%>; and under his glory <S%H3519><s%> he shall kindle <S%H3344><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a burning <S%H3350><s%> like the burning of a fire <S%H784><s%>.

And the light <S%H216><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be for a fire <S%H784><s%>, and his Holy One <S%H6918><s%> for a flame <S%H3852><s%>: and it shall burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his tshofars <S%H7898><s%> and his briers <S%H8068><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>;

And shall consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of his forest <S%H3293><s%>, and of his fruitful field <S%H3759><s%>, both soul <S%H5315><s%> and body <S%H1320><s%>: and they shall be as when a standardbearer <S%H5263><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fainteth <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
And the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> of his forest <S%H3293><s%> shall be few <S%H4557><s%>, that a child <S%H5288><s%> may write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and such as are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, shall no more again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> stay <S%H8172><s%> <S%H8736><s%> upon him that smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them; but shall stay <S%H8172><s%> <S%H8738><s%> upon the YY <S%H3068><s%>, HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, in truth <S%H571><s%>.
The remnant <S%H7605><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, even the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, unto the mighty <S%H1368><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>.

For though thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> be as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, yet a remnant <S%H7605><s%> of them shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: the consumption <S%H3631><s%> decreed <S%H2782><s%> <S%H8803><s%> shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

For the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a consumption <S%H3617><s%>, even determined <S%H2782><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of all the land <S%H776><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, O my people <S%H5971><s%> that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the Ashurn <S%H804><s%>: he shall smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with a rod <S%H7626><s%>, and shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his staff <S%H4294><s%> against thee, after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
For yet a very <S%H4213><s%> little while <S%H4592><s%>, and the indignation <S%H2195><s%> shall cease <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and mine anger <S%H639><s%> in their destruction <S%H8399><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8790><s%> a scourge <S%H7752><s%> for him according to the slaughter <S%H4347><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> at the rock <S%H6697><s%> of Oreb <S%H6159><s%>: and as his rod <S%H4294><s%> was upon the sea <S%H3220><s%>, so shall he lift it up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that his burden <S%H5448><s%> shall be taken away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from off thy shoulder <S%H7926><s%>, and his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off thy neck <S%H6677><s%>, and the yoke <S%H5923><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H2254><s%> <S%H8795><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the anointing <S%H8081><s%>.

He is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Aiath <S%H5857><s%>, he is passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Migron <S%H4051><s%>; at Michmash <S%H4363><s%> he hath laid up <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his carriages <S%H3627><s%>:

They are gone over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the passage <S%H4569><s%>: they have taken up their lodging <S%H4411><s%> at Geba <S%H1387><s%>; Ramah <S%H7414><s%> is afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> is fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Lift up <S%H6670><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy voice <S%H6963><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H1530><s%> Gallim <S%H1554><s%>: cause it to be heard <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto Laish <S%H3919><s%>, O poor <S%H6041><s%> Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>.
Madmenah <S%H4088><s%> is removed <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Gebim <S%H1374><s%> gather themselves to flee <S%H5756><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

As yet shall he remain <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> at Nob <S%H5011><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>: he shall shake <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8787><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Behold, the YY <S%H113><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, shall lop <S%H5586><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the bough <S%H6288><s%> with terror <S%H4637><s%>: and the high ones <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of stature <S%H6967><s%> shall be hewn down <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and the haughty <S%H1364><s%> shall be humbled <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he shall cut down <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the thickets <S%H5442><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> with iron <S%H1270><s%>, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by a mighty one <S%H117><s%>.
